com.ep.ggs.system

Class PrivilegesHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ep.ggs.system.PrivilegesHandler

  • public class PrivilegesHandler
extends Object
    This class handles the MCForge Staff Privileges system. All of the properties for the system along with the support for it is located in this class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PrivilegesHandler.StaffRank

    • Field Detail

      • privilegesEnabled

        public boolean privilegesEnabled
        Whether the privileges system is enabled. Setting this to false will override both the privilegesEnabled property and the protectionEnabled property.

      • perksEnabled

        public boolean perksEnabled
        Whether the perks system is enabled.

      • protectionEnabled

        public boolean protectionEnabled
        Whether the protection system is enabled.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrivilegesHandler

        public PrivilegesHandler(Server server)

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws IOException
        Initializes the PrivilegesHandler. Use this method to fully load the PrivilegesHandler.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadStaffRanks

        public boolean loadStaffRanks()
        Loads the list of MCForge staff. The list is retrieved from the URL http://server.mcforge.net/devs.txt.

      • loadAllowedCommands

        public void loadAllowedCommands()
                         throws IOException
        Loads the commands that MCForge staff is allowed to use despite their permission level.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadProtectedCommands

        public void loadProtectedCommands()
                           throws IOException
        Loads the commands that MCForge staff is protected from.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadProperties

        public void loadProperties()
                    throws IOException
        Loads the properties for the PrivilegesHandler. Note that this only loads the staffprivileges.config file. To load allowed and protected commands use loadProtectedCommands() or loadAllowedCommands().
        Throws:
        IOException

      • canOverride

        public boolean canOverride(CommandExecutor p,
                  Command command)
        Checks if the specified player can override the command permissions for the specified command.
        Parameters:
        p - - The player to check for.
        command - - The command to check for.

                  Command command)

        Parameters:
        name - - The name of the player to check for.
        command - - The command to check for.
